long_description: The REI Herringbone crew socks feature soft, breathable merino wool and classic herringbone pattern so your feet feel great and look even better. REI Herringbone sock bottoms are padded with lightweight terry; legs and tops of feet are a slim flat-knit. Merino wool naturally regulates temperature in any climate, wicks moisture and resists odors. Nylon provides durability; Lycra(R) spandex provides stretch to improve fit. Flat toe seams minimize chafing and irritation. Closeout.
short_description: The REI Herringbone crew socks feature soft, breathable merino wool and classic herringbone pattern so your feet feel great and look even better.
